name: Fixed Network Service Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Site Survey Supervision
  • Hardware Installation Supervision
  • Network Design LLD
  • Equipment commissioning and integration
  • Service Migration and Troubleshooting
  • Acceptance Test and Test Program Output
  • Routine Work and Work Flow Establishment

Requirements:

  • DWDM background and experience (Mandatory for normal/optional for Low).
  • Major is telecom, data communication, network, computer (Optional).
  • Certification and Training: Huawei, Alcatel-Lucent, NSN, etc.(optional)
  • Skill: NMS U2000, WDM equipment and measurements tools(OSA, testers, etc).
  • Protocol Skill: WDM, SDH, IP(basic), .
  • English: Average or above (written, spoken is mandatory).

Conditions:

  • Skill improvement, professional growth.
  • Work in the leading international multi-brand company.
  • Opportunity to work in English-speaking environment.
  • Corporate sim-card.
  • Competitive salary.
  • Official employment to Agency.

  • Most of project support work will be done remotely.

  • Part of time may have business trip to other cities supporting on-site.
